system.effects: Pay 1 ship point, gain Enemy(Imperial Navy). Pay 2 gain Good Reputation (Imperial Navy). Regardless, +10 to command tests aboard vessel. If ship is crippled, make +0 Command Test, on success vessel does not suffer effects of being crippled until next turn.
